      <path class="path5" d="M22.021 16.268c0-0.348-0.281-0.63-0.629-0.63h-2.014c-0.348 0-0.629 0.282-0.629 0.63v2.014c0 0.347 0.281 0.629 0.629 0.629h2.014c0.348 0 0.629-0.282 0.629-0.63v-2.013z">
      </path>
      <path class="path6" d="M17.521 16.268c0-0.348-0.282-0.63-0.63-0.63h-2.013c-0.348 0-0.63 0.282-0.63 0.63v2.014c0 0.347 0.282 0.629 0.63 0.629h2.013c0.348 0 0.63-0.282 0.63-0.63v-2.013z">
      </path>
      <path class="path7" d="M26.929 18.282c0 0.348-0.281 0.63-0.629 0.63h-2.014c-0.348 0-0.629-0.282-0.629-0.63v-2.014c0-0.347 0.281-0.629 0.629-0.629h2.014c0.348 0 0.629 0.282 0.629 0.63v2.013z">

              Degree programs
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/math/graduate/courses">
              Courses
             </a>
            </li>

             <a href="/math/graduate/studentresources">
              Student resources
             </a>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="/math/graduate/financialsupport">
              Financial support
             </a>
            </li>

             <a href="https://math.iupui.edu/department-mathematical-sciences/people?page=0&amp;classif=31&amp;dept=6?page=0&amp;classif=31&amp;dept=6">
              Graduate student directory
             </a>
            </li>

             <a href="/math/graduate/admissions">
              Admissions
             </a>
            </li>

          </li>
          <li class="top-level">
           <a href="/math/alumniandgiving">
            Alumni &amp; Giving
           </a>

            <li>
             <a data-svg-icon="none" href="/math/alumniandgiving/giving">
              Giving to Math
             </a>
            </li>

           <a href="/math/research">

        </div>
       </nav>
      </div>
      <!-- end module:global-header -->
      <main class="department" id="main" name="main" tabindex="-1">
       <!-- page title and intro -->
       <section class="dept-masthead">
        <figure>
         <picture class="poster">
          <source media="(min-width: 600px)" srcset="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/level-masthead-large/public/dept_masthead_math_1.png?itok=vdxDxTh3">
          </source>
          <img alt="Math equations written in white chalk on green board" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/level-masthead-small/public/dept_masthead_math_1.png?itok=VKcX6lP4"/>
         </picture>
        </figure>
       </section>
       <section class="dept-about-us">
        <h2>
         <span class="svg-container">
          <svg class="svgicon svgicon-math">
           <use xlink:href="#svgicon-math">
           </use>
          </svg>
         </span>
         Department of Mathematical Sciences
        </h2>
        <div class="wrapper">
         <div class="who">
          <h3>
           WHO WE ARE
          </h3>
          <p>
           Come experience the fascinating world of mathematics with us! We are a diverse group of teachers and researchers, exploring mathematics, statistics, and their applications in science and medicine. The department runs many active research seminars, conferences, and special events, bringing experts from around the world to IUPUI. We offer bachelor's, master’s, and doctoral degrees, and our students go on to an array of careers in academics, education, industry, insurance, and medicine.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="events-list">
          <h3>
           Upcoming Math Events
           <a class="view-all" href="https://math.iupui.edu/department-mathematical-sciences/events" title="view all math events">
            View all events
           </a>
          </h3>
          <ul>
           <li class="event" role="article">
            <h4>
             <a href="/about/events/addiction-researchers-showcase">
              Addiction Researchers Showcase
              <span class="svg-container">
               <svg class="svgicon svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h4>
            <time datetime="1534276800">
             Tuesday, August 14, 2018, 4:00 PM - 7:30 PM
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="event" role="article">
            <h4>
             <a href="/about/events/honors-induction">
              Honors Induction
              <span class="svg-container">
               <svg class="svgicon svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h4>
            <time datetime="1534712400">
             Sunday, August 19, 2018, 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="event" role="article">
            <h4>
             <a href="/about/events/meiere-symposium-science-society-and-computational-revolution">
              Meiere Symposium "Science, Society, and the Computational Revolution
              <span class="svg-container">
               <svg class="svgicon svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h4>
            <time datetime="1535083200">
             Friday, August 24, 2018
            </time>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <section class="dept-slider" id="dept-slider">
        <ul>
         <li>
          <div class="wrapper">
           <div class="one" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-medium/public/mandelbrot_pic.jpg?itok=b3PJT_pt)">

           </div>

            <div class="three" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small1_math_1.png?itok=mlxRpfhA)">

            <div class="four" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small2_math_1.png?itok=oui17YJO)">

          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <div class="wrapper">
           <div class="one" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-medium/public/dept_medium_math_2.png?itok=1LdS_Mz8)">
            <img alt="Five math students standing together wearing medals around their necks" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-medium/public/dept_medium_math_2.png?itok=1LdS_Mz8"/>
           </div>
           <div class="two" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-large/public/mathematician_at_work.jpg?itok=ujkNCif1)">
            <img alt="Mathematician at Work" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-large/public/mathematician_at_work.jpg?itok=ujkNCif1" title="Mathematician at Work"/>
           </div>
           <div class="third">
            <div class="three" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small1_math_2.png?itok=u8dM_UGC)">
             <img alt="Computer graphics diagram of model development" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small1_math_2.png?itok=u8dM_UGC"/>
            </div>
            <div class="four" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small2_math_2.png?itok=8QUFPbVA)">
             <img alt="Student holding violin in front of blackboard with math written on it" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/department-carousel-small/public/dept_small2_math_2.png?itok=8QUFPbVA"/>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </section>
       <section class="dept-features">
        <div class="wrapper">
         <div class="feature">
          <h2>
           Did you know?
          </h2>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Actuarial science is ranked as the No. 1 best job in the U.S.
          </p>
          <p>
           Science grads earn $15,500 more on average than non-science grads and there's 3x more growth in STEM than any other field nationwide.
          </p>
          <span class="icon" role="presentation">
           <svg class="svgicon svgicon-math">
            <use xlink:href="#svgicon-math">
            </use>
           </svg>
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="student-story">
          <figure aria-describedby="story-info-849" class="full-bleed" data-img="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/student-story-thumbnail/public/w_p_u_tn_math_caris_daily_1.png?itok=PFQ1c0MN" role="img" style="background-image: url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/student-story-thumbnail/public/w_p_u_tn_math_caris_daily_1.png?itok=PFQ1c0MN), url(https://math.iupui.edu/sites/all/themes/iupui/_files/img/bg_student_gradient.png)">
           <img src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/student-story-thumbnail/public/w_p_u_tn_math_caris_daily_1.png?itok=PFQ1c0MN"/>
           <a class="btn red" href="/sciencespotlights/undergraduate/life-giving-leads-math-student-needy-classrooms">
            See My Story
           </a>
          </figure>
          <!-- Needs unique generated ID -->
          <div class="info" id="story-info-849">
           <p class="copy">
            “I think a lot of these kids need good mentors, people who can help them overcome their fears and really look at a way to help them relate math to their everyday life."
           </p>
           <span class="name">
            <span rel="sioc:has_creator">
             Caris Daily
            </span>
           </span>
           <span class="major">
            Mathematics, Undergraduate
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <!-- major ctas location 1 -->
       <!-- research news -->
       <section class="level-research-news" id="level-research-news">
        <h2>
         <span class="svg-container">
          <svg class="svgicon svgicon-newspaper">
           <use xlink:href="#svgicon-newspaper">
           </use>
          </svg>
         </span>
         Math News
        </h2>
        <a class="view-all" href="https://math.iupui.edu/department-mathematical-sciences/news?page=0&amp;category=15&amp;month=all&amp;year=all">
         view all news
        </a>
        <div class="stories">
         <article role="article">
          <figure>
           <a href="/2018/05/ams-graduate-student-chapter-highlight-roozbah-gharakhloo">
            <img src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/related-news-feature/public/roozbah.png?itok=HFuO-Ze-"/>
           </a>
           <figcaption>
            <a class="tag" href="/tags/mathematical-sciences">
             #Math
            </a>
            <h3>
             <a href="/2018/05/ams-graduate-student-chapter-highlight-roozbah-gharakhloo">
              AMS Graduate Student Chapter Highlight: Roozbah Gharakhloo
              <span class="svg-container">
               <svg class="svgicon svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- Content here -->
            <p>
             MISSION To organize activities which effectively help graduate students to broaden/deepen their mathematical knowledge. The activities...
            </p>
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
         </article>
         <article role="article">
          <figure>
           <a href="/2018/04/pagengenschool-science-announces-top-100-students-2018">
            <img alt="Your 2018 Top 100 Science Students!" src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/related-news-feature/public/top100_0.jpeg?itok=C6rOIRX2"/>
           </a>
           <figcaption>
            <a class="tag" href="/events-tags/school-science">
             #School-of-Science
            </a>

             <a href="/2018/04/pagengenschool-science-announces-top-100-students-2018">
              School of Science announces Top 100 Students for 2018

                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- Content here -->
            <p>
             INDIANAPOLIS – With 41 students on this year’s Top 100 list, nearly half of the students recognized are enrolled in the School of...
            </p>
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
         </article>
         <article role="article">
          <figure>
           <a href="/2018/02/math-researcher-elected-polish-academy-sciences">
            <img alt="Michal Misiurewicz " src="https://math.iupui.edu/sites/default/files/styles/related-news-feature/public/misiurewicz-feature.png?itok=Pgulru38"/>
           </a>
           <figcaption>
            <a class="tag" href="/tags/mathematical-sciences">
             #Math
            </a>
            <h3>
             <a href="/2018/02/math-researcher-elected-polish-academy-sciences">
              Math researcher elected to the Polish Academy of Sciences
              <span class="svg-container">

                <use xlink:href="#svgicon-double-right-chevron">
                </use>
               </svg>
              </span>
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- Content here -->
            <p>
             INDIANAPOLIS - IUPUI professor of mathematical sciences Michal Misiurewicz has been elected a foreign member of the Polish Academy of...
            </p>
           </figcaption>
          </figure>
         </article>
        </div>
       </section>
       <section class="dept-stat-fact-quote">
        <div class="node node-callout-factstatquote node-teaser fact">
         <h2>
          DID YOU KNOW?
         </h2>
         <hr/>
         <p>
          The Mathematics Assistance Center (MAC) offers tutoring and peer mentoring and is the largest student employer on campus, employing over 70 students who handle 1,000 visitors each week.
         </p>
         <a class="btn red" href="https://mac.iupui.edu/">
          Learn more about the MAC
         </a>
        </div>
       </section>
      </main>

      <section class="belt">
       <div class="wrapper">
        <address>
         <h2>
          Department of Mathematical Sciences
         </h2>
         <span class="school">
          Mathematical Sciences
         </span>
         <span class="address">
          402 N Blackford St. Indianapolis, IN 46202 LD270
         </span>
         <span class="contact">
          <span class="phone">
           <a href="tel:317.274.6918">
            317.274.6918
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="email">
           <a href="mailto:info@math.iupui.edu">
            info@math.iupui.edu
           </a>
          </span>
         </span>
        </address>
